name: Stoic Life Journal 2.0
description: One-of-a-kind Stoic Journaling Template for Notion, designed to give you insight and clarity in life by journaling the stoic way.Improve your journaling experience in a way you've never thought possible with this lightweight and digital stoic journal made with love in Notion. ✓ Travel back 2,000 years in time✓ Achieve true stoic mastery and clarity✓ Talk to ancient philosophers in real-timeChoose from 18 different Stoic teachers, who all have pre-defined journaling questions tailored to their sp
features: Complete Journaling Dashboard; Personal phrase collection system; Unlimited amounts of journal entries; Easy sorting and storage; Weekly review journal; 18+ total stoic teachers; 54+ total stoic quotes; 270+ total writing prompts; 1350+ total journaling questions; Familiarize yourself with your new 18 Stoic Teachers... and learn what each of them stood for and taught in their respective Stoic school:
